Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.pircbotx.hooks.managers.GenericListenerManager
    Due to multiple new functions of PircBotX theat depend on multiple threads, this class is deprecated and is only kept for legacy reasons or special cases. Use of this class will have unexpected results. All bots should now use ThreadedListenerManager.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.pircbotx.UserChannelDao.channelExists(String)
    Renamed UserChannelDao.containsChannel(java.lang.String) to match the Java Collections API
    org.pircbotx.hooks.events.IncomingChatRequestEvent.getChatAddress()
    Use IncomingChatRequestEvent.getAddress() from GenericDCCEvent interface
    org.pircbotx.hooks.events.IncomingChatRequestEvent.getChatPort()
    Use IncomingChatRequestEvent.getPort() from GenericDCCEvent interface
    org.pircbotx.hooks.events.IncomingChatRequestEvent.getChatToken()
    Use IncomingChatRequestEvent.getToken() from GenericDCCEvent interface
    org.pircbotx.hooks.events.PartEvent.getDaoSnapshot()
    Use PartEvent.getUserChannelDaoSnapshot() from GenericSnapshotEvent
    org.pircbotx.hooks.events.DisconnectEvent.getDaoSnapshot()
    Use DisconnectEvent.getUserChannelDaoSnapshot() from GenericSnapshotEvent
    org.pircbotx.hooks.events.QuitEvent.getDaoSnapshot()
    Use QuitEvent.getUserChannelDaoSnapshot() from GenericSnapshotEvent
    org.pircbotx.hooks.events.SetChannelBanEvent.getHostmask()
    Use SetChannelBanEvent.getBanHostmask()
    org.pircbotx.hooks.events.IncomingFileTransferEvent.getTransferToken()
    Use IncomingFileTransferEvent.getToken() from GenericDCCEvent interface
    org.pircbotx.hooks.events.OwnerEvent.isFounder()
    Use isOwner, this method being called isFounder is a bug. Will be removed in future versions
    org.pircbotx.hooks.events.VoiceEvent.isVoice()
    Use the better named hasVoice method. Will be removed in future versions
    org.pircbotx.hooks.events.OutputEvent.respond(String)
    Cannot respond to output
    org.pircbotx.hooks.events.DisconnectEvent.respond(String)
    org.pircbotx.hooks.events.ConnectAttemptFailedEvent.respond(String)
    org.pircbotx.hooks.events.QuitEvent.respond(String)
    org.pircbotx.Configuration.Builder.setServer(String)
    Use Configuration.Builder.addServer(java.lang.String), will be removed in future releases
    org.pircbotx.Configuration.Builder.setServer(String, int)
    Use Configuration.Builder.addServer(java.lang.String, int), will be removed in future releases
    org.pircbotx.Configuration.Builder.setServerHostname(String)
    Use Configuration.Builder.addServer(java.lang.String), will be removed in future releases
    org.pircbotx.Configuration.Builder.setServerPort(int)
    Use Configuration.Builder.addServer(java.lang.String, int), will be removed in future releases
    org.pircbotx.UserChannelDao.userExists(String)
    Renamed UserChannelDao.containsUser(java.lang.String) to match Java Collections API
